longBusinessSummary: PNB Housing Finance Limited operates as a housing finance company in India. It provides loans to individuals and corporate bodies for purchase, construction, repair, and up-gradation of houses/flats/commercial properties; residential plot loans and loans for NRIs; loan against property, lease rental discounting, and loans for real estate developers; home loans and fixed deposit products. PNB Housing Finance Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in New Delhi, India.
